thread.title: Councillors to consider water restriction change (Tamworth Regional Council)
thread.title_full: Councillors to consider water restriction change (Tamworth Regional Council) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Councillors to consider water restriction change (Tamworth Regional Council)
text: ( Source : Tamworth Regional Council ) Friday 9 October, 2015 Tamworth Regional Councillors will consider a report at next Tuesday night's Ordinary Meeting which recommends reinstating the current Drought Management Plan for the Tamworth Water
